title: Gold Holds Gains as Divergent Fed Remarks Temper Easing Outlook
description: Gold steadied following four days of gains, after conflicting remarks from Federal Reserve officials prompted traders to curb bets on further monetary easing in the US next year.
content: Gold steadied following four days of gains, after conflicting remarks from Federal Reserve officials prompted traders to curb bets on further monetary easing in the US next year.
